comment.body: That's all China's doing, GFW blocks the main tracker. Best bet is to be using VPN + TOR, as is general operating procedure under an authortarian govt

@A7oiz: Privacy concerns will never drive most people away from clearnet as most people do not care about privacy. Making it simpler will help, but overall there has to be value built on ZN. What's the point of one-click access if the only thing to do is watch idiots rant on ZeroTalk?
@A7oiz: +1. We all have more work to do to make this someplace people can access and that people want to be
